item.title: Backblaze
item.author: Thorsten Sideb0ard
item.description: the legendary Mike Hoover turned me on to Backblaze a few months back - they're a cloud storage provider, who opened up the design for their chassis and storage pod solution so you can build your own “Storage Pod 2.0: a 135-terabyte, 4U server for $7,384″ (blog post here)
